replies.body: I think the real reason we're never in the World Championships is because to even get a spot we need to beat Turkey Japan, Russia, Brazil and all of South America basically. That means the spot is contested by representatives from 4 continents. NA has it easy, even if they are the better team.

What is even worse is even the very top teams in OCE rarely get to play or scrim against other teams from different regions who are much stronger. If Riot could have an international server open for these pro teams to at least practice against, smaller regions could get a better shot once they are at these wild card tournaments and worlds.
